message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Hope you agree, Bob!  Let's get this money divided!
I'll give you a slightly better deal. 60/40 in my favor. It's still a good offer, don't you think?
Your offer was a bit too generous, Bob.  I'm willing to negotiate, but I think 60/40 is a fairer split.  Let's get this done!
I'll give you a slightly better deal. 58/42 in my favor. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I'm not willing to give up too much more.
